price: Dájúdájú àwọn tó ń páyà (ìṣírò-iṣẹ́) nípa ìpáyà wọn nínú Olúwa wọn;
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiqūna
